Header.title: NeuroTech
Header.paragraph: NeuroTech provides fNIRS solutions to measure brain activity.

About.paragraph: NeuroTech is developing and deploying a wearable sensor to measure brain activity.  We use infrared light to non-invasively measure changing oxygen concentration in the user’s brain, and relate this to changes in the user’s condition.

Services.name: Sleep Efficiency Analysis
Services.text: View analysis of your sleep efficiency with a graphic interface.

Services.name: Identify Sleep Stages
Services.text: Identify the different sleep stages including the time you fall asleep, wake up, and enter or exit deep/light sleep.

Services.name: View Sleep Data
Services.text: View your daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly sleep data.

Services.name: Instant Data
Services.text: Measure your instant oxyhemoglobin level and compare it with scientific data.

Services.name: Compare Your Data
Services.text: Compare your sleep data with a scientific basis.

Services.name: Set Goal
Services.text: Set a sleep time or efficiency goal daily or weekly and track them.
